item.title: Fieldset
item.description: Making forms accessible is a simple process. Each form element should be associated with its instructions and errors, and everything should be accessible via the keyboard. How to test Identify each form element. Find all instructions associated with each element. It is a failure if a form element isnâ€™t programatically associated with all instructions. This includes legends, labels, hint text and tooltips. A common way of achieving this is using fieldset and legend tags.
